name: DoppelGhöster
description:
Created for NM Game Jam 2020, DoppelGhöster is a puzzle game made to challenge your coordination. Playing as a guest to a haunted mansion, under mysterious circumstances you find your body and soul separated! Now, you must combine your body and soul once more by collecting the pieces of holy objects scattered around the mansion. 

Coding: Jonathan Chance
https://twitter.com/Mystic__Tech

Art: Miko-Koro
https://twitter.com/miko__koro?lang=en

Sound: Daen Olson
www.soundcloud.com/daenolson
